Cephas Sowah Patterson

Bsc. Information Technology

I come from La in the Greater Accra Region of Ghana. A community of indigenous Ga people. Majority of my basic education from KG to primary 2 was done in La. I live in Dansoman where I've been for the past 7 years with my parents and brother.

My parents in the persons of Very Rev'd Solomon A. Patterson (my father) and Mrs. Juliana Patterson (my mother) are the two wonderful people who cater for me. My younger brother is in the person of Jedidiah Nii Odoi Patterson.

My basic education was quite of journey having to change schools so many times but i can say it was all worth it. It started in Precious Child Academy (Twi Bleoo) for my nursery training then to Kings Palace School (La) for my kindergarten to class 2 primary education. I went on to Hope In Christ School (Lartebiokorshie) from class 3 to class 6. Ministry of Health Basic school (Korle-bu) was where i completed my Junior High School education.

I went to Achimota School for my secondary education as a general science student for three years. There i was in Aggrey House where i was made Assistant House Prefect in my final year.

For my Tertiary education, i'm in Ghana Technology University College. Currently, i'm in my third year as a Bsc. Information Technology student.
